```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```


### Plot 1

```{r}
data(trees)
?trees
```

# acquires the dataset for "trees' and examines the properties of the data set. 

```{r}
ggplot(data = trees, mapping = aes(x = Height, y =Girth)) +
geom_point()
```

# creates a scatterplot comapring Height vs Girth from the trees data set.

year
